10299c9183f754d74b9d8d9eb9e47900b5d2c2ce:
mutation CreateCourse($name: String!, $displayName: String!, $description: String, $color: String, $startDate: Date!, $endDate: Date!, $isGroupCreationEnabled: Boolean!, $groupDeadlineDate: Date!, $maxGroupSize: Int!, $preferredGroupSize: Int!, $notificationEmail: String, $isGamificationEnabled: Boolean!) {
  createCourse(name: $name, displayName: $displayName, description: $description, color: $color, startDate: $startDate, endDate: $endDate, isGroupCreationEnabled: $isGroupCreationEnabled, groupDeadlineDate: $groupDeadlineDate, maxGroupSize: $maxGroupSize, preferredGroupSize: $preferredGroupSize, notificationEmail: $notificationEmail, isGamificationEnabled: $isGamificationEnabled) {
    id
    name
    displayName
    description
    color
    startDate
    endDate
    isGroupCreationEnabled
    groupDeadlineDate
    maxGroupSize
    preferredGroupSize
    notificationEmail
    isGamificationEnabled
    __typename
  }
}
21e8c6b99c053fcdc346553a5a42c2c4ac63d6ca:
mutation RespondToElementStack($stackId: Int!, $courseId: String!, $responses: [StackResponseInput!]!, $stackAnswerTime: Int!) {
  respondToElementStack(stackId: $stackId, courseId: $courseId, responses: $responses, stackAnswerTime: $stackAnswerTime) {
    id
    status
    score
    evaluations {
      instanceId
      pointsMultiplier
      explanation
      feedbacks {
        ix
        feedback
        correct
        value
        __typename
      }
      choices
      numAnswers
      answers
      score
      pointsAwarded
      percentile
      newPointsFrom
      xpAwarded
      newXpFrom
      solutions
      solutionRanges
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}
db30f0efb35796ebb4faf26a80976ee8ba1cba36:
mutation UpdateCourseSettings($id: String!, $name: String, $displayName: String, $description: String, $color: String, $startDate: Date, $endDate: Date, $isGroupCreationEnabled: Boolean, $groupDeadlineDate: Date, $notificationEmail: String, $isGamificationEnabled: Boolean) {
  updateCourseSettings(id: $id, name: $name, displayName: $displayName, description: $description, color: $color, startDate: $startDate, endDate: $endDate, isGroupCreationEnabled: $isGroupCreationEnabled, groupDeadlineDate: $groupDeadlineDate, notificationEmail: $notificationEmail, isGamificationEnabled: $isGamificationEnabled) {
    id
    name
    displayName
    description
    color
    startDate
    endDate
    isGroupCreationEnabled
    groupDeadlineDate
    notificationEmail
    isGamificationEnabled
    __typename
  }
}
1cebcf67b09d57c62b0fb445497c5f435c834796:
query GetCockpitSession($id: String!) {
  cockpitSession(id: $id) {
    id
    isLiveQAEnabled
    isConfusionFeedbackEnabled
    isModerationEnabled
    isGamificationEnabled
    namespace
    name
    displayName
    status
    startedAt
    course {
      id
      displayName
      __typename
    }
    blocks {
      id
      numOfParticipants
      order
      status
      expiresAt
      timeLimit
      randomSelection
      execution
      instances {
        id
        questionData {
          id
          questionId
          pointsMultiplier
          name
          type
          content
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    activeBlock {
      id
      __typename
    }
    confusionSummary {
      speed
      difficulty
      numberOfParticipants
      __typename
    }
    feedbacks {
      id
      isPublished
      isPinned
      isResolved
      content
      votes
      createdAt
      resolvedAt
      responses {
        id
        content
        positiveReactions
        negativeReactions
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}
394a4b86087798237bab8c7db79377727caf1edb:
query GetCourseOverviewData($courseId: String!) {
  getCourseOverviewData(courseId: $courseId) {
    id
    inRandomGroupPool
    participant {
      id
      avatar
      username
      xp
      level
      participantGroups {
        id
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    participation {
      id
      isActive
      __typename
    }
    course {
      id
      displayName
      color
      description
      isGamificationEnabled
      groupDeadlineDate
      isGroupDeadlinePassed
      isGroupCreationEnabled
      maxGroupSize
      preferredGroupSize
      awards {
        id
        order
        type
        displayName
        description
        participant {
          id
          username
          avatar
          __typename
        }
        participantGroup {
          id
          name
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      groupActivities {
        id
        displayName
        description
        scheduledStartAt
        scheduledEndAt
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    leaderboard {
      id
      participantId
      username
      avatar
      score
      isSelf
      rank
      level
      __typename
    }
    leaderboardStatistics {
      participantCount
      averageScore
      __typename
    }
    groupLeaderboard {
      id
      name
      score
      rank
      isMember
      __typename
    }
    groupLeaderboardStatistics {
      participantCount
      averageScore
      __typename
    }
    groupActivityInstances {
      id
      decisionsSubmittedAt
      results
      resultsComputedAt
      groupActivityId
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
  participantGroups(courseId: $courseId) {
    id
    name
    code
    averageMemberScore
    groupActivityScore
    score
    participants {
      id
      username
      avatar
      score
      isSelf
      level
      rank
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}
b33e84156822ff5ba3013fb1ddb31eae21ecfd40:
query GetFeedbacks($sessionId: String!) {
  feedbacks(id: $sessionId) {

    responses {

      createdAt
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}
bdaa0fad94e9b90cd6352670fcab374f7b88c08a:
query GetPinnedFeedbacks($id: String!) {
  pinnedFeedbacks(id: $id) {
    id
    isLiveQAEnabled
    isConfusionFeedbackEnabled
    isModerationEnabled
    isGamificationEnabled
    confusionSummary {
      speed
      difficulty
      numberOfParticipants
      __typename
    }
    feedbacks {
      id
      isPublished
      isPinned
      isResolved
      content
      votes
      createdAt
      resolvedAt
      responses {
        id
        content
        positiveReactions
        negativeReactions
        createdAt
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}
5732c91f4344a09b5a1e531f9a61a1584ccc529c:
query GetPublicParticipantProfile($id: String!) {
  publicParticipantProfile(participantId: $id) {
    id
    username
    avatar
    avatarSettings
    isProfilePublic
    isSelf
    level
    levelData {
      id
      avatar
      name
      index
      requiredXp
      nextLevel {
        id
        index
        avatar
        requiredXp
        name
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    xp
    achievements {
      id
      achievedAt
      achievedCount
      achievement {
        id
        nameDE
        nameEN
        descriptionDE
        descriptionEN
        icon
        iconColor
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}
76bae7597312b50e5134cc9c5ee5ef0751e30e18:
query GetSingleCourse($courseId: String!) {
  course(id: $courseId) {
    id
    isArchived
    isGamificationEnabled
    pinCode
    name
    displayName
    description
    color
    numOfParticipants
    numOfActiveParticipants
    averageScore
    averageActiveScore
    startDate
    endDate
    isGroupCreationEnabled
    groupDeadlineDate
    maxGroupSize
    preferredGroupSize
    randomAssignmentFinalized
    sessions {
      id
      name
      displayName
      isGamificationEnabled
      pinCode
      accessMode
      status
      createdAt
      numOfBlocks
      numOfQuestions
      __typename
    }
    practiceQuizzes {
      id
      name
      displayName
      status
      availableFrom
      numOfStacks
      __typename
    }
    groupActivities {
      id
      name
      displayName
      status
      scheduledStartAt
      scheduledEndAt
      numOfQuestions
      __typename
    }
    microLearnings {
      id
      name
      displayName
      status
      scheduledStartAt
      scheduledEndAt
      numOfStacks
      __typename
    }
    leaderboard {
      id
      score
      rank
      username
      email
      avatar
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}

    blocks {

}
